> Mobster groaned when War Machine stomped on his head. He aimed right up to
> WarMachine an fired, he is still on the ground...
> ----- Original Message -----

{Scorpina}

    The shots the gesalt had fired ahd knocked her from the bots leg and had
blasted the tail off her beast mode and forcing her into robot mode. Shaking
her head trying to clear the sparks from her optics she turned aiming an arm
towards the gesalts side and letting loose with a pair of mini missiles.
